item.title: IndieWeb
item.description: IndieWeb The idea about making own website or web page to store the content on your own platform instead of social media controlled by corporations. Links indieweb.org IndieAuth Into the Personal-Website-Verse Making the blog part of the Fediverse and IndieWeb brid.gy tantek.com
